document.discussion_title: OCI deserves gold medal for managing to arrange meeting
document.topic_text: OCI deserves gold medal for managing to arrange meeting Monday, 22 August 2016 ( Rio 2016: Brazil goes wild as football team win Olympic gold 00:24 Neymar inspired Brazil to redemption, revenge and glory, helping atone for the most humiliating night in the country's footballing history by defeating nemesis Germany on penalties to finally win Olympic gold. The wounds remain raw two years on from a 7-1 World Cup semi-final shellacking that not... You Might Like
